review: I LOOOOOOOOOOVE my ChromeCast.  I now own two and it's spectacular to be able to "cast" my apps to my TV and to even mirror my phone onto the TV.  I was concerned that casting would drain my battery, but it does not.  The phone just controls the ChromeCast (unless you're mirroring).  I was casting Netflix and had to turn my phone off to replace the battery on my phone and Netflix kept playing, uninterrupted.  REALLY great device and cheap, too!
author: Aaron B.

review: You don't need cable! We steam almost everything from my galaxy phone and iPad, itouch and iPhone with no problem. You won't be able to stream everything but majority of the things you watch on your phone can be steamed directly to the TV!! And it doesn't kill my batteries and I can use my phone to complete other tasks as I'm streaming! It's like magic!
